snippet: Over the opposition of many California tribes, Gov. Pete Wilson signed legislation today ratifying gambling compacts that allow 11 Indian tribes to open the first state-sanctioned tribal casinos.    The legislation, called the Pala Compact, is the...
lead_paragraph: Over the opposition of many California tribes, Gov. Pete Wilson signed legislation today ratifying gambling compacts that allow 11 Indian tribes to open the first state-sanctioned tribal casinos. The legislation, called the Pala Compact, is the model the state hopes California's 90 other tribes will follow to open restricted, state-sanctioned tribal casinos. Tribes have put on the Nov. 3 ballot Proposition 5, which would allow a rival compact that critics say is more in line with Nevada-style casinos.
abstract: Gov Pete Wilson signs legislation ratifying gambling compacts that will allow 11 Indian tribes in California to open the first state-sanctioned tribal casinos (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; Gambling Pacts Ratified For 11 California Tribes
